pr_title: SAK-44466 Ensure we get a non null locale from preferences

timeline.bodyText: Should this be using the agent?
timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: Why? The locale is brand new in the bean, and it's used to render stuff in the user's language. Shouldn't that be okay?
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: because the rest of the logic in that method is using it!
replies.author: ern

replies.bodyText: I used agent in the first place, just because it was there already.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: I suppose it could. I'll try it out now.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: I switched them because I was testing if an instructor didn't have an agent string, like a student. That was it.
replies.author: adrianfish
